scavengers.tPlay module

scavengers.util module

These modules compute load important parameters for the functions of GaNGiaLF. The configuration file. New output directories. rcparamFile for plotting options.

scavengers.util.loadCfg(file=None)

Loads configuration file

file: str, optional

full path to parameter file if not specified gufo_default.yaml is taken from GaNGiaLF installation directory

cfg_par: OrderedDict,

updated dictionary with all parameters needed by GaNGiaLF.

Run automatically by bin/gufo

scavengers.util.loadRcParams()

Loads the standard rc parameters for uniform plots.

dict()

scavengers.util.prettyOutput_Done(outputlabel, progressbar=False)
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_DonePrefix()
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_Failed(outputlabel, progressbar=False)
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_FailedPrefix()
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_Running(outputlabel)
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_Warning(outputlabel, progressbar=False)
scavengers.util.prettyOutput_WarningPrefix()
scavengers.util.printProgress(iteration, total, prefix='', suffix='', decimals=2, barLength=80, color='g')

Call in a loop to create terminal progress bar @params:

iteration - Required : current iteration (Int) total - Required : total iterations (Int) prefix - Optional : prefix string (Str) suffix - Optional : suffix string (Str) color - Optional : color identifier (Str)

scavengers.util.set_dirs(cfg_par)

Defines parameters and makes directories for workflow.

cfg_par: OrderedDict

input dictionary of parameters given in the config file

cfg_par: OrderedDict,

updated dictionary with all parameters needed by GaNGiaLF.

Run automatically by bin/gufo
